Hi,

Could you help me on how to increase the Icon height and width of Modern Button. I tried IconWidth and IconHeight Property but it doesn't change the icon area.

Thanks.

See this proposed work item https://mui.codeplex.com/workitem/19918

If you make these code changes then just set the EllipseDiameter property of the ModernButton.
Variable sized ModernButtons now supported (added in changeset 101521)

I've tried to use the new ModernButton and found that the picture in a button does not change a size automatically. Obviously, I can change that by IconHeight/IconWidth, but it brings more complexity if the button has a dynamic size.

I also found that the original (W8) buttons have a titles under the button.

Hi,

is it possible to make a button' border is thicker? It looks very tiny if an ellipse diameter is over 40.
